Post.title: Vue VSCode Snippets VueVSCode
Post._content:
> 
> 


# 
IDEVue VSCode SnippetsVSCVUE
<!-- more -->



Script


Snippet | Purpose
---|---
vbase | Single file component base
vbase|	Single file component base
vdata|	Component data as a function
vmethod|	Vue method
vcomputed|	Vue computed property
vwatcher|	Vue watcher with new and old value args
vprops|	Props with type and default
vimport	|Import one component into another
vimport-c|	Import one component into another within the export statement
vimport-export|	Import one component into another and use it within the export statement
vfilter	|Vue filter
vmixin|	Create a Vue Mixin
vmixin-use|	Bring a mixin into a component to use
vc-direct|	Vue create a custom directive
vimport-lib	|Import a library
vimport-gsap|	Import GreenSock with Timeline and Eases
vanimhook-js|	Using the Transition component JS hooks in methods
<!-- more -->
Template

Snippet | Purpose
---|---
vfor|	v-for directive
vmodel|	Semantic v-model directive
vmodel-num|	Semantic v-model number directive
von	|v-on click handler with arguments
vel-props|	Component element with props
vsrc|	Image src binding
vstyle|	Inline style binding
vstyle-obj|	Inline style binding with objects
vclass|	Class binding
vclass-obj|	Class binding with objects
vclass-obj-mult	|Multiple conditional class bindings
vanim|	Transition component with JS hooks

Vuex

Snippet | Purpose
---|---
vstore|	Base for Vuex store.js
vgetters|	Vuex Getter
vmutation|	Vuex Mutation
vaction|	Vuex Action
vstore-import|	Import vuex store into main.js

Extra (plaintext)

Snippet | Purpose
---|---
gitignore|	.gitignore file presets
vinc|	incrementer
vdec|	decrementer

Post.title: Vue
Post._content:
> 
> 

# 
VUEVuecliVue

<!-- more -->
### 

```
npm install --global vue-cli
vue init webpack my-project
cd my-project
npm installcnpm install
cnpm cnpm
npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org
npm run dev
```
### 
> - buildconfig 
> - node_modules 
> - src /
>    - assets  
>    - components 
>    - res
>      - css csscss
>      - js   js
>      - img
>    - router 
>    - views  vue
>    - vuex : 
>    - App.vue : 
>    - main.js vue
> - index.html  html
> - distwebpack
> - package.json

### :
 `npm run dev``dev-server.js``webpack` `webpack.base.conf``entry``app'./src/main.js'` 

`npm run dev``main.js``main.js` vue`app.vue`

### Build/dev-server.js
1. nodenpm
1. 
1. expresswebpack
1. webpack-dev-middlewarewebpack-hot-middleware
1. 
1. 
1. 8080
1. localhost:8080

### Build/huild.js
1. loading
1. 
1. webpack
1. 

### 
#### .babelrc 
es6

```
npm install babel-preset-es2015
```

presets ;

#### .editorconfig 

- indent_style: tab;
- indent_size: ;
- tab_width:  tabindent_size;
- end_of_linelfcrcrlf;
- charset ;
- trim_trailing_whitespacetrue;
- insert_final_newline:  true;
- root:true.editorconfig;

#### .eslintignore  
eslint, 

#### .eslintrc.js 


#### .gitignore  


### .VUE 
- template 
- import  js
- export default 
  - data
  - methods 		       
  - mounted	
  - created
- style    scopedvue



### 
#### axios
1. 

```
axios#request(config)
axios#get(url[, config])
axios#delete(url[, config])
axios#head(url[, config])
axios#post(url[, data[, config]])
axios#put(url[, data[, config]])
axios#patch(url[, data[, config]])
```

2. 
- Promise
- then
- catch
3. use/reject

```
axios.interceptors.response.use
axios.interceptors.rquest.use
reject()
```

4. 
- json
- qs

### 
- Prpos
- 
- 
- Vuex

### 

1. 

```
Vue.use(Router)

export default new Router({
  routes: [
    {
      path: '/',
      name: 'Hello',
      component: Hello
    }
  ]
})

new Vue({
  el: '#app',
  router,
  template: '<App/>',
  components: { App }
})
```

2. 
- push
- replace
- go
3. 
- RESTful url
-  query
-   hash: '#data'
4. 
- Children
5. 
- beforeRouteEnter
- beforeRouteLeave

### 
> Vuex
> 
> Vuex  Vue.js 

- state
- mutations 
- gettersstatestate
- actionsmutationcommit
- mutations 
- modulesjs

## 
### Hexo [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)

```
$ npm install hexo-cli -g // hexo
$ hexo init blog // 
$ cd blog // 
$ npm install // 
$ hexo server // 
```
> 


```
.
 _config.yml
 package.json
 scaffolds
 source
|    _drafts
|    _posts
 themes
```
`_config.yml`

`package.json`

`scaffolds`

`source``_posts`

`themes`



### Next [Next](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/)


```
$ cd your-hexo-site
$ git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next
```

`_config.yml`nextnext

```
theme: next
```
HexoHexo`` ``



### 
https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next/blob/master/docs/zh-CN/UPDATE-FROM-5.1.X.md

## 


```
hexo new [layout] <title>  
// layout title
hexo new title

```
`_posts`mdMarkDownMarkDownMarkDown

date: 2017-10-11 15:01:09
tags:

date: 2017-10-11 15:01:09
categories:

---
```

```


GitHub
## BlogGitHub
githubREADME.mdgitpagegitpage
### 
GitHub

```
GitHub.github.io
// 
lixuguang.github.io
```
blog`_config.yml`

```
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: <repository url>
  
// 
deploy:
  type: git
  repo: git@github.com:lixuguang/lixuguang.github.io.git
  branch: master

```


```
$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save // 

$ hexo deploy

```

https://github.github.io/

https://lixuguang.github.io/

github

## 



```
$ hexo server
// 
$ hexo s

$ hexo generate
// 
$ hexo g

$ hexo deploy
// 
$ hexo d

$ hexo new
// 
$ hexo n
```



```
$ hexo clean

```


```
$ hexo clean
$ hexo g -d // 
$ hexo d -g // 

```

## 
1. SSH

```
$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "lixuguang316@gmail.com"
// github

```

open ~/.ssh // Macssh

Post.title: npm
Post._content:
> 
> 

# 
nodenodenpmnpm
<!-- more -->

> npmNode Package Managernode.jsnpmnpm

## npm

### npm
- http://npm.taobao.org/
- registryhttp://registry.npm.taobao.org/

### cnpmjs
- http://cnpmjs.org/
- registryhttp://r.cnpmjs.org/

## 
npmregistrynpm

### 1.
```
npm --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org install express
```
### 2.

```
npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org

// 
npm config get registry
// 
npm info express
```
### 3.cnpm

```
npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org

// 
cnpm install express
```
